rows.label: qev056101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ]!
I have been looking for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0002
rows.name:
I have need once more for the strength that freed us
from the Ganglion and led us to safety.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Before explaining any further, allow me to ask how
familiar you are with the recent anomaly within the
Orphean population.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0004
rows.name:
The division of one of my people produced a mutation.
Do you know of this beta phenotype or "betaform"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask to hear more about it.

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0020
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0021
rows.name: Make sure that On'tonam means the red Orphean.

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0005
rows.name:
They bear a striking red coloration, and have only
begun to appear since we took asylum in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0006
rows.name:
In addition to various morphological differences,
their psychology is unlike that of other Orpheans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0007
rows.name: So you have already made contact?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0008
rows.name:
Then you have witnessed firsthand how different their
psychology is from that of conventional Orpheans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0009
rows.name:
They are illogical and extremely curious.
Almost humanlike, in that regard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Recently, these betaforms have begun to argue
that the Orphe should shut out the voice of their
Ovah and live according to their own free will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0011
rows.name:
It has escalated to the point where they speak of an
anti-Ovah revolution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0012
rows.name:
They clashed with my own group, then departed for
Noctilum after an extensive series of debates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0013
rows.name:
As you know, that forest is rife with danger.
It is hardly a place where Orpheans could survive
without protection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0014
rows.name:
I would like you to find them and return them to the
safety of the city—by force if necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0110
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0111
rows.name: Say that the Orphe should resolve this split internally.

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0120
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask to hear more about this new faction.

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0130
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0131
rows.name:
Tell On'tonam that his group should respect
the choice of the other Orpheans.

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0015
rows.name: I lack the strength to perform this task myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0016
rows.name:
And even if I were able to locate them, Run'tonam—
the anti-Ovah revolution movement's leader—would
likely refuse to hear anything I said.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0017
rows.name:
We exchanged countless words over the course of our
debates, but in the end my side was unable to correct
her thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0018
rows.name:
But a human like you should be able to speak with
them more easily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Their leader, Run'tonam, calls for an end to obedience
to the Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Instead, she favors reliance on free will,
akin to the way you humans live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0021
rows.name:
We argued the point during countless debates,
but in the end I failed to correct her bizarre thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0022
rows.name:
But a human like you should be able to speak with
them more easily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0023
rows.name:
You and Run'tonam think alike—she is the leader of the
anti-Ovah revolutionary movement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0024
rows.name:
But the fact remains that they will most certainly die out
there if left alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Their thinking may be almost human,
but their physiology remains that of the frail Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Can I depend on you to find Run'tonam and the others
who left with her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Run'tonam left with Mun'luarb, Man'celeg,
and Rin'luarb.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0028
rows.name:
By our calculations, the probability of them surviving in
Noctilum unassisted is zero.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0029
rows.name:
But you humans have defied our calculations on several
instances in the past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0030
rows.name:
I ask that you put that unpredictable and inscrutable
ability of yours to use again and keep my fellow
Orpheans safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Run'tonam believes something of vital importance to us
Orphe exists in the depths of Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0032
rows.name: It is a fool's delusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0033
rows.name:
Our Ovah clearly states that we are not to approach
the woods in that region again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0034
rows.name: Please find them and bring them back safely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0035
rows.name: What is this...? My Ovah seethes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0036
rows.name:
What has happened?
Where are Run'tonam and the others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0210
rows.name: Report

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0211
rows.name: Tell On'tonam that they were eaten by indigens.

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0220
rows.name: Relay

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0221
rows.name: Deliver Run'tonam's message.

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0037
rows.name: That is the fate of those who would deny the Ovah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0038
rows.name:
Expanding our numbers to secure a future for the
Orphe on Mira is our first priority. We should have
been united in that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0039
rows.name:
...Devoured by a beast? And yet her last words were
that we must learn to master our Ovah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0040
rows.name: Ridiculous! The Ovah is ever with us, and we with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0041
rows.name:
To betray that is to negate any meaning to our
existence here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0042
rows.name:
This should at least show any other anti-Ovah
supporters the folly of their stance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0043
rows.name:
These deaths are stark evidence that we cannot live
without the guidance of the Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0044
rows.name:
The loss of Run'tonam and the others pains me,
but I hope this will bring the Orphe together again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0045
rows.name:
I plan to take an active role in guiding new divisions
so that this tragedy is not repeated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0046
rows.name:
In the meantime, you have completed the task I asked
of you. Please accept your reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0047
rows.name: What is this...? My Ovah seethes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0048
rows.name:
What has happened?
Where are Run'tonam and the others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0049
rows.name:
This... Is this truly her right hand?
Then she was eaten...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0050
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0051
rows.name:
Hmm... It seems I can still sense the Ovah that once
flowed within her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0052
rows.name: Only...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0053
rows.name: No! It cannot be![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0054
rows.name:
Is this the world seen by the Ovah before they came to
reside within the Orphe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0055
rows.name:
We had already encountered that terrible beast,
even then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0310
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0311
rows.name: Ask On'tonam what he saw.

rows.label: qev056101_JNK0320
rows.name: Relay

rows.label: qev056101_SEL0321
rows.name: Deliver Run'tonam's message.

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0056
rows.name:
It was...a memory. From a time before the Orphe
evolved and appeared on the stage of history.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0057
rows.name:
A memory from an age when the Ovah existed as a
single entity floating in the ocean of another world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0058
rows.name: It was not a clear or cohesive vision...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0059
rows.name:
But the creature you slew was there as well,
living within a different ecology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0060
rows.name: I do not know what this memory means.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0061
rows.name:
But it is a glimpse of some deeper truth which
Run'tonam gave her life to uncover.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0062
rows.name: We must change...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0063
rows.name:
I feel as if I can understand what she meant by that,
now that I have touched her Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0064
rows.name:
I was unable to comprehend the thinking of those that
rejected the Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0065
rows.name:
But this planet holds many mysteries that cannot be
explained with the information we have now.
That beast is a fine example.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0066
rows.name:
If we hope to preserve the Orphe as a race on Mira,
it will take a more advanced form of reasoning than
even the will of the Ovah can provide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0067
rows.name: I will take both Run'tonam's words and her life into me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0068
rows.name:
From now on, I will seek out a new path forward as
she did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0069
rows.name:
Thank you for bringing her will back to me.
I am truly grateful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev056101_MSG0070
rows.name:
You have helped me change my entire perspective.
I now feel ready to speak to the anti-Ovah revolutionists
with a flexible and open mind.[ST:wait ]
